entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We are pleased to bring to your attention 1 new gallery Ashrams and Centers.
Please kindly share the news and the link with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam

entry.title: Photos Post 22: Special Events (after 1975), Part 07
entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We are pleased to let you know that 6 Photos from the special event have been uploaded to Eternal Moments: 6 high resolutions from the Named Collections.
The direct link to the 9 Photos of the event in the smallest gallery: Collection 1995.
Please kindly share the link with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam

entry.title: Photos Post 22: Special Events (after 1975), Part 03
entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

The direct link to the Photo in the smallest gallery: Collection 1995.
The event has as well 1 photo Moments of Joy which can be seen in the smallest gallery at the link Collection Moments of Joy.
Please kindly share the link with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

entry.title: Photos Post 11: Special Events (after 1975), Part 99
entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We are pleased to let you know that 6 Photos from the special event 1984-0215 Marriages, Bordi, India have been uploaded to Eternal Moments: 6 high resolutions from the Named Collections.
The direct link to the 27 Photos of the event in the smallest gallery: India 1984.
The marriages' events have as well 31 photos Moments of Joy which can be seen in the smallest gallery at the link Moments of Joy 1984.
Please kindly share the link with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam
sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com
https://linktr.ee/comprehensivecompilationsteam
